caption.center: Manuel RIPOLL v. STATE of Mississippi.

opinion.posture: Appeal from County Court, Warren County; James E. Nichols, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Everett Verhine, John B. Gee, Vicksburg, for appellant.
A.F. Summer, Atty. Gen. by Frankie Walton White and Robert D. Findley, Sp. Asst. Attys. Gen., Jackson, for appellee.
opinion.panel: Before SMITH, P.J., and LEE and BOWLING, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
REVERSED AND APPELLANT DISCHARGED.
PATTERSON, C.J., INZER, P.J., and ROBERTSON, SUGG, WALKER and BROOM, JJ., concur.
